com.kevalpatel2106.emoticongifkeyboard.internal.emoticon

Class EmoticonRecentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kevalpatel2106.emoticongifkeyboard.internal.emoticon.EmoticonRecentManager

  • final class EmoticonRecentManager
extends Object
    This is singleton class to handle the recent emoticons and recently selected categories.
    Author:
    'https://github.com/kevalpatel2106'

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

      • getPreferences

        private SharedPreferences getPreferences()

      • getLastCategory

        int getLastCategory()
        Returns:
        Last opened EmoticonsCategories.

      • setLastCategory

        void setLastCategory(int recentCategory)
        Set the recently opened category.
        Parameters:
        recentCategory - recently opened category from EmoticonsCategories.

      • loadRecentEmoticons

        @NonNull
private ArrayList<Emoticon> loadRecentEmoticons()
        Load all the recently used emoticons. This will parse the shared preference of the recent emoticons and return them into an array list.

      • add

        void add(@NonNull
         Emoticon emoticon)
        Add new emoticons to the recent list. This will always add new emoticon to the first position to keep most recent emoticons first. Once the list gets updated saveRecentEmoticons() method will be called to save updated list.
        Parameters:
        emoticon - Emoticon to add.
        See Also:
        saveRecentEmoticons()

      • getRecentEmoticons

        @NonNull
ArrayList<Emoticon> getRecentEmoticons()
        Returns:
        List of recently used Emoticon.

      • saveRecentEmoticons

        private void saveRecentEmoticons()
        Save the recent emoticons list. This will save first 100 emoticons unicode to the shared preference with '~' saturation character.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Reset all the recent emoticons and last selected category.
